title: #232 - Mary Midgley
itunes:title: #232 - Mary Midgley
description: Strap in ladies and gentlemen because it's time for the most epic roast battle in philosophical history. In one corner, the neo-Darwinist himself, Richard Dawkins. In the other corner, weighing in at 99 years of age, it's Newcastle University's Mary Midgley. Who will survive with their dignity intact? Certainly not your hosts, Connor and Dan.
